testcase.name: programaComIfElseValido
testcase.system-out:
> TESTANDO CODIGO: program p; var x: integer; begin if x > 0 then x := x - 1 else x := 0; end.
=== ARVORE PARSE (hierarquica) === program (programp;varx:integer;beginifx>0thenx:=x-1elsex:=0;end.<EOF>) +-- terminal (program) +-- identifier (p) |-- terminal (p) +-- terminal (;) +-- block (varx:integer;beginifx>0thenx:=x-1elsex:=0;end) |-- variableDeclarationPart (varx:integer;) |-- terminal (var) |-- variableDeclaration (x:integer) |-- identifierList (x) |-- identifier (x) |-- terminal (x) |-- terminal (:) |-- type_ (integer) |-- terminal (integer) |-- terminal (;) |-- compoundStatement (beginifx>0thenx:=x-1elsex:=0;end) |-- terminal (begin) |-- statements (ifx>0thenx:=x-1elsex:=0) |-- statement (ifx>0thenx:=x-1elsex:=0) |-- structuredStatement (ifx>0thenx:=x-1elsex:=0) |-- ifStatement (ifx>0thenx:=x-1elsex:=0) |-- terminal (if) |-- expression (x>0) |-- simpleExpression (x) |-- term (x) |-- factor (x) |-- identifier (x) |-- terminal (x) |-- relationalOperator (>) |-- terminal (>) |-- simpleExpression (0) |-- term (0) |-- factor (0) |-- unsignedNumber (0) |-- terminal (0) |-- terminal (then) |-- statement (x:=x-1) |-- simpleStatement (x:=x-1) |-- assignmentStatement (x:=x-1) |-- identifier (x) |-- terminal (x) |-- terminal (:=) |-- expression (x-1) |-- simpleExpression (x-1) |-- term (x) |-- factor (x) |-- identifier (x) |-- terminal (x) |-- additiveOperator (-) |-- terminal (-) |-- term (1) |-- factor (1) |-- unsignedNumber (1) |-- terminal (1) |-- terminal (else) |-- statement (x:=0) |-- simpleStatement (x:=0) |-- assignmentStatement (x:=0) |-- identifier (x) |-- terminal (x) |-- terminal (:=) |-- expression (0) |-- simpleExpression (0) |-- term (0) |-- factor (0) |-- unsignedNumber (0) |-- terminal (0) |-- terminal (;) |-- terminal (end) +-- terminal (.) +-- terminal (<EOF>) ================================== ✅ Árvore salva em: test-reports/parse-trees/teste2_if_else_tree.txt

testcase.name: programaComWhileValido
testcase.system-out:
> TESTANDO CODIGO: program w; var i: integer; begin i := 0; while i < 10 do i := i + 1; end.
=== ARVORE PARSE (hierarquica) === program (programw;vari:integer;begini:=0;whilei<10doi:=i+1;end.<EOF>) +-- terminal (program) +-- identifier (w) |-- terminal (w) +-- terminal (;) +-- block (vari:integer;begini:=0;whilei<10doi:=i+1;end) |-- variableDeclarationPart (vari:integer;) |-- terminal (var) |-- variableDeclaration (i:integer) |-- identifierList (i) |-- identifier (i) |-- terminal (i) |-- terminal (:) |-- type_ (integer) |-- terminal (integer) |-- terminal (;) |-- compoundStatement (begini:=0;whilei<10doi:=i+1;end) |-- terminal (begin) |-- statements (i:=0;whilei<10doi:=i+1) |-- statement (i:=0) |-- simpleStatement (i:=0) |-- assignmentStatement (i:=0) |-- identifier (i) |-- terminal (i) |-- terminal (:=) |-- expression (0) |-- simpleExpression (0) |-- term (0) |-- factor (0) |-- unsignedNumber (0) |-- terminal (0) |-- terminal (;) |-- statement (whilei<10doi:=i+1) |-- structuredStatement (whilei<10doi:=i+1) |-- whileStatement (whilei<10doi:=i+1) |-- terminal (while) |-- expression (i<10) |-- simpleExpression (i) |-- term (i) |-- factor (i) |-- identifier (i) |-- terminal (i) |-- relationalOperator (<) |-- terminal (<) |-- simpleExpression (10) |-- term (10) |-- factor (10) |-- unsignedNumber (10) |-- terminal (10) |-- terminal (do) |-- statement (i:=i+1) |-- simpleStatement (i:=i+1) |-- assignmentStatement (i:=i+1) |-- identifier (i) |-- terminal (i) |-- terminal (:=) |-- expression (i+1) |-- simpleExpression (i+1) |-- term (i) |-- factor (i) |-- identifier (i) |-- terminal (i) |-- additiveOperator (+) |-- terminal (+) |-- term (1) |-- factor (1) |-- unsignedNumber (1) |-- terminal (1) |-- terminal (;) |-- terminal (end) +-- terminal (.) +-- terminal (<EOF>) ================================== ✅ Árvore salva em: test-reports/parse-trees/teste3_while_valido_tree.txt

testcase.name: programaComForValido
testcase.system-out:
> TESTANDO CODIGO: program f; var i: integer; begin for i := 1 to 5 do print(i); end.
=== ARVORE PARSE (hierarquica) === program (programf;vari:integer;beginfori:=1to5doprint(i);end.<EOF>) +-- terminal (program) +-- identifier (f) |-- terminal (f) +-- terminal (;) +-- block (vari:integer;beginfori:=1to5doprint(i);end) |-- variableDeclarationPart (vari:integer;) |-- terminal (var) |-- variableDeclaration (i:integer) |-- identifierList (i) |-- identifier (i) |-- terminal (i) |-- terminal (:) |-- type_ (integer) |-- terminal (integer) |-- terminal (;) |-- compoundStatement (beginfori:=1to5doprint(i);end) |-- terminal (begin) |-- statements (fori:=1to5doprint(i)) |-- statement (fori:=1to5doprint(i)) |-- structuredStatement (fori:=1to5doprint(i)) |-- forStatement (fori:=1to5doprint(i)) |-- terminal (for) |-- identifier (i) |-- terminal (i) |-- terminal (:=) |-- expression (1) |-- simpleExpression (1) |-- term (1) |-- factor (1) |-- unsignedNumber (1) |-- terminal (1) |-- terminal (to) |-- expression (5) |-- simpleExpression (5) |-- term (5) |-- factor (5) |-- unsignedNumber (5) |-- terminal (5) |-- terminal (do) |-- statement (print(i)) |-- simpleStatement (print(i)) |-- ioStatement (print(i)) |-- terminal (print) |-- terminal (() |-- expression (i) |-- simpleExpression (i) |-- term (i) |-- factor (i) |-- identifier (i) |-- terminal (i) |-- terminal ()) |-- terminal (;) |-- terminal (end) +-- terminal (.) +-- terminal (<EOF>) ================================== ✅ Árvore salva em: test-reports/parse-trees/teste4_for_valido_tree.txt

testcase.name: testVariavelNaoDeclarada
testcase.system-out:
> TESTANDO CODIGO (SEMANTICO): program p; begin x := 10; end.
MSG ERRO SEMANTICO: Variavel 'x' nao declarada ---------------------------------- ✅ Erro semântico salvo em: test-reports/semantic-errors/teste5_variavel_nao_declarada_error.txt

testcase.name: testRedeclaracaoNoMesmoEscopo
testcase.system-out:
> TESTANDO CODIGO (SEMANTICO): program p; var x, x: integer; begin end.
